The restaurant is basically self-served.  You find a table or pick a spot at the bar counter, then you decide what to eat by picking the tapas dishes from the shelves on the bar counter.  Each dish has a toothpick.  At the end, the waitress counts the number of sticks (each stick is €1.65) and bill you.  Food is excellent, especially you get to try many many dishes.  We sampled many tapas and all are excellent.
